physical_appearance:This is a purple and pink cheongsam and it is sleeveless. There is a collar present as well. There are no visible tears on the exterior of the cheongsam. There is no piping on the front of the cheongsam as well. Stripes that run vertically down the cheongsam are present on its front as well as the collar. Also
 running down the middle of the cheongsam is patterned embroidery that is symmetrical in design. The embroidery is pink in colour.
subject_terms_1:dresses (garments) womenswear stripes geometric patterns running ornament lace (needlework)
subject_terms_2:Qipao Ethnic costume Women\u0027s clothing Motifs
subject_terms_3:Ethnic costume Chinese costume
sgcool_label_text:This is a sleeveless cheongsam in light purple and pink stripes. A patterned embroidery in light pink runs down the centre of the cheongsam on the front. This cheongsam was wore by Mrs Lee In Tong in her younger days.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a purple and pink cheongsam and it is sleeveless. There is a collar present as well. There are no visible tears on the exterior of the cheongsam. There is no piping on the front of the cheongsam as well. Stripes that run vertically down the cheongsam are present on its front as well as the collar. Also, running down the middle of the cheongsam is patterned embroidery that is symmetrical in design. The embroidery is pink in colour.
